text: “Iye ndiamene adatsitsa chikhazikiko (kudekha) m’mitima mwa okhulupirira kuti awonjezera chikhulupiliro pachikhulupiro chawo. Makamu ankhondo akumwamba ndi pansi, nga Allah, (monga angelo, ziwanda, nyama ziphaliwali, mphepo yamkuntho ndi zivomerezi ndi zina zotero); ndipo Allah Ngodziwa chilichonse, ndiponso Wanzeru zakuya
